SA10bsa021_u:vv_1_0: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaścet /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_2_0: atha sasvabhāvametadvākyaṃ śrutvā hatā pratijñā te /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_4_1: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato duṣyate na mama //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_5_0: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvan yadyupalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_9_0: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ityevam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_10_0: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_10_1: dharmairvinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktamupadeṣṭum //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_11_0: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ityayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_11_1: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_12_0: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratividhyate tvayānena /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_14_0: nanvevaṃ satyasti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tagdṛhītaṃ ca /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_14_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_15_0: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_15_1: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro 'sya tu na santi //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_16_0: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraśca yadyuta na santi /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_17_0: hetostato na siddhirnaiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_18_0: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_19_1: loke naiḥsvābhāvyānna hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_20_0: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyamiti ca nopapannam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_22_0: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā hyuktā /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_22_1: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_24_1: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuśca na nigadyaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_25_0: mā śabdavaditi nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yastvayā mamārabdhaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_25_1: śabdena hi tacca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naiva me vacaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_28_0: athavā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ heturna hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_29_0: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syādeṣa me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_29_1: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_31_1: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_38_0: nāsti tamaśca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati sadātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_38_1: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_39_1: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_42_0: anapekṣya hi prameyānarthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhiḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_44_0: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇyapekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_45_1: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_46_1: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_47_0: atha tai pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā cā
SA10bsa021_u:vv_48_0: sidhyanti hi pramāṇairyadi prameyāṇi tāni taireva /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_49_0: sidhyanti ca prameyairyadi pramāṇāni tāni taireva /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_50_0: pitrā yadyutpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_50_1: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_51_0: kaśca pitā kaḥ putrastatra tvaṃ brūhi tāvubhāvapi ca /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_52_1: bhavati na ca prameyairna cāpyakasmāt pramāṇānām //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_54_0: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_54_1: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_55_0: atha na pratītya kiṃcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_56_0: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāśca laukikā na syuḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_58_0: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sa svabhāva ityevam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_58_1: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaśca na vyaṃ sat //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_59_0: nāmāsaditi ca yadidaṃ tatkiṃ nu sato bhavatyutāsataḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_59_1: yadi hi sato yadyasato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_61_0: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata iti /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_62_0: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanvapratiṣiddhamidam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_63_0: pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tacca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_63_1: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanvevaṃ hīyate vādaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_64_0: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣedhyamasti na ca kiṃcit /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_66_1: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_67_0: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt bhāvo na syāt pratītyasamudbhūtaḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_67_1: yaśca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva //
SA10bsa021_u:vv_68_0: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kastaṃ nivartayed grāhyam /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_69_0: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_70_0: yastraikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_71_0: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10bsa021_u:vv_71_1: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ na bhavati śūnyatā yasyeti //
